title: Server IP addresses to test ping
body: I was trying to find a forum online that had riot server IP address to test each servers ping from your current location. Also, I saw that it's basically impossible to get to KR server something about being a KR citizen etc. Correct me if I'm wrong please. I'm looking to make a new account on a different server to get better (kinda like korean bootcamp). So any server suggestions would be appreciated.

replies.body: Looks like you're writing from the NA region currently. If you live in NA, then the NA region is going to give you the best ping.

I was more so wondering like what would my ping be like on EUW and other servers. I remember a long time ago there used to be a thread that had other servers IP that I could ping on my connection to test what the ms would be.
Ahhhh my bad, a good IP to ping for testing your connection to EUW servers would be 192.64.170.252. Give it a shot and let me know if that'll work out for ya or not ^_^
